hiveArticle.title: Seven Days of Black and White Challenge - Day 4
hiveArticle.body:
I was nominated for the Seven Days Black and White Challenge by @geetharao Mam.

So the rules of the challenge is -

1 - Take 7 black and white photos, that represent the aspect of your life.
2 - Present one image everyday for seven days..
3 - No People.
4 - No explanation..
5 - Nominate someone everyday, although anyone can join in.
6 - Use the tag # sevendaybnwphotochallenge as one of your five tags.
7 - Adding a title is optional.

Day 4 :

![IMG_20180102_092700_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUG6Mv2sepoUp25JrcX4nKZFmYQWxqYGAJajtazp2BngE/IMG_20180102_092700_2.jpg)

I would like to nominate @syedumair, who also likes to take photos from his smartphone.
